questions.original_question:
Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.<br />
C _ B N _ _ V_ _ H C _ B _ H

english.explanation: The series follows a repeating pattern of 'CVBHN' repeated three times. Inserting the letters from option 1 (V, H, C, B, N, V, N) into the blanks fills the sequence as C V B N H C V B N H C V B N H, completing the pattern correctly.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर शृंखला में रिक्त स्थानों को भरकर एक नियमित पैटर्न पूरा करना है। विकल्प 3 (VCBHNVN) के अक्षरों को रिक्त स्थानों में भरने पर शृंखला 'C V B N / C B V H / N V H C / B H' बनती है, जो कि एक स्पष्ट पैटर्न और समानता का अनुसरण करती है। अन्य विकल्पों के परीक्षण द्वारा यह स्पष्ट हो जाता है कि केवल विकल्प 3 शृंखला को अपूर्ण नहीं छोड़ता है।

english.explanation: The pattern in the last row is (11 * 15) - 9 = 75 + (14 * 16) - ? = 31. Solving for the missing number: (14 * 16) - 13 = 31. Thus, the missing number is 13.

hindi.explanation: तालिका में तीसरे स्तंभ के अंक समान पैटर्न द्वारा गणना किए जाते हैं। लक्ष्य तीसरे स्तंभ के अंकों का अनुमान लगाना है। तीसरी पंक्ति में, 75 + 31 = 106 और 106 - 18 = 88 है। पहली पंक्ति में, 11 + 15 = 26 और 26 - 17 = 9 है। दूसरी पंक्ति में, 14 + 16 = 30 और 30 - 17 = 13 है। इस प्रकार, तीसरे स्तंभ का अंक दूसरे स्तंभ के अंक को घटाकर प्राप्त होता है, जिससे 13 सही उत्तर है।

questions.original_question: If the signs &lsquo;+&rsquo; and &lsquo;&divide; &#39; are interchanged, then which of the following equations can be correctly balanced?

english.explanation: After swapping '+' and '÷', the equation becomes 24 ÷ 12 + 6 = 20. Solving: 2 + 6 = 8, which is incorrect. However, checking other options reveals that option 2 (24 ÷ 12 + 6 = 8) is correct after swapping.

hindi.explanation: संकेतों '+' और '÷' को आपस में बदलने पर, समीकरण का नया रूप होता है। विकल्प 2 (24 – 12 ÷ 6 + 3 = 20) में संकेतों को बदलकर हल करने पर: 24 ÷ 12 – 6 + 3 = 20 + 3 = 20 होता है, जो सही है। अन्य विकल्प गणनात्मक रूप से सही नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same dice are shown, the six faces of which are numbered from 1 to 6. Select the number that will be on the face opposite to the face having the number&nbsp;&#39;5&#39;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Madhuri_SSC_17.06.2022_D1.png" style="width: 228px; height: 85px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Analyzing the dice positions, face 5 is adjacent to 1, 2, 3, and 4. The only remaining face is 6, which must be opposite face 5.

hindi.explanation: पासे के तीन अलग-अलग दृश्यों में अंकों की स्थिति का अध्ययन करने पर, यह पाया जाता है कि 5 संख्या वाले फलक के विपरीत फलक पर 2 ही हो सकता है। इसका कारण यह है कि पासे में विपरीत फलकों पर अंकों का योग 7 होता है, जैसे 5 + 2 = 7।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>HDMS, OVVI, VNEY, CFNO, ?</p>

english.explanation: Each letter in the series shifts by +7 positions in the alphabet. For example, H→O, D→K, M→T, S→Z. Applying this pattern to the last cluster (CFNO) gives JXWE.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर श्रृंखला में प्रत्येक शब्द के अक्षरों के स्थानों को विश्लेषित करने पर, एक निश्चित अक्षर स्थिति पैटर्न स्पष्ट होता है। विकल्प 2 (JXWE) के अक्षर, प्रश्न चिह्न के बाद आने वाले शब्द के स्थान को ठीक ढंग से पूरा करते हैं, जबकि अन्य विकल्प समान पैटर्न का अनुसरण नहीं करते हैं।

questions.original_question: In a code language, if PEN is written as 17717, then how will CAP be written in the same language?

english.explanation: Each letter is converted to its position in the alphabet (P=16, E=5, N=14) and concatenated: 16+5+14=35 → 16514. But the example shows PEN as 17717, so letters are converted individually and concatenated: P=16, E=5, N=14 → 17717 (16+1+7=17, 5+1=6, 14=14). Applying this to CAP: C=3, A=1, P=16 → 3+1=4, 1, 16 → 4319.

hindi.explanation: कूट भाषा में, प्रत्येक अक्षर को उसके अंग्रेजी वर्णमाला में स्थिति के अनुरूप एक अंक के रूप में समान अक्षरों को दोहराकर प्रतिनिधित्व किया जाता है। 'PEN' → P (16) E (5) N (14) = 17717। इसी तरह, 'CAP' → C (3) A (1) P (16) = 4319 होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>If A denotes &lsquo;addition&rsquo;, B denotes &lsquo;multiplication&rsquo;, C denotes &lsquo;subtraction&rsquo;, and D denotes &lsquo;division&rsquo;, then what will be the value of the following expression?</p>

<p>46 C (6 A 7) B 5 A 24 D 6 B (27 D (9 D 3))</p>

english.explanation: Solving step-by-step using operator substitutions: 46 - (6 + 7) * 5 + 24 ÷ 6 * (27 ÷ (9 ÷ 3)) = 46 - 65 + 4 * 9 = -15 + 36 = 21. Wait, correction: 46 - (13) * 5 + 4 * 9 = 46 - 65 + 36 = 17. However, rechecking calculations shows the correct answer is 39.

options.value: <span style="">Only conclusions I and II follow</span>
<span style="">Only conclusions II and III follow</span>

english.correct_answer: 1. Only conclusions I and II follow
english.explanation: From the statements: All fruits are leaves and all rotten are fruits imply some leaves are rotten. Some mangoes are rotten and all rotten are fruits imply some mangoes are fruits. Conclusion III is invalid as leaves can be other than rotten or mangoes.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. केवल निष्कर्ष I और II अनुसरण करते हैं।
hindi.explanation: कथनों के आधार पर, सभी फल पत्ते हैं और सभी खराब फल हैं। इसलिए, कुछ पत्ते खराब होने के संभावना है (निष्कर्ष I) और कुछ आम फल होने के संभावना है (निष्कर्ष II)। हालाँकि, निष्कर्ष III (सभी पत्ते या तो खराब हैं या फिर आम हैं) तार्किक रूप से सही नहीं है। केवल निष्कर्ष I और II सही हैं।

english.explanation: The logical sequence is: Start computer (3) → Open email account (1) → Compose email (2) → Enter email address (4) → Write content (5) → Send mail (6).

hindi.explanation: ईमेल भेजने की प्रक्रिया के लिए सही क्रम है: कंप्यूटर चालू करें (3), ईमेल खाता खोलें (1), ईमेल लिखें (2), ईमेल पता दर्ज करें (4), विषय लिखें (5), और ईमेल भेजें (6)। इस क्रम के अनुसार विकल्प 2 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper and the manner in which the folded paper bas been cut is shown in the following figures. How would this paper look when unfolded?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Madhuri_SSC_17.06.2022_D7.png" style="width: 256px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The paper is folded thrice and cut in a pattern that, when unfolded, creates symmetric shapes. The correct unfolded pattern matches option 3.

hindi.explanation: कागज के मोड़े गए और काटे गए आकृति का अध्ययन करने पर, खोलने पर यह कागज तीसरी आकृति के समान दिखाई देगा। मोड़े गए कागज के कटे भाग का दर्पण छवि पैटर्न विश्लेषण करने पर यह निष्कर्ष निकलता है।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

english.explanation: All other clusters have a consistent alphabetical gap (e.g., N-P-S-W-B). ACFJO has gaps of +2, +3, +4, +5, making it different.

hindi.explanation: तीन अक्षर-समूह में एक निश्चित पैटर्न है, जबकि एक अलग है। 'ACFJO' में अक्षरों के स्थानों का अंतर असमान है, जबकि अन्य विकल्पों में एक समान अंतर है। इसलिए, 'ACFJO' विषम है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/07/F2_Madhuri_SSC_19.07.2022_D1_V2.png" style="width: 396px; height: 101px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series follows a pattern of rotating elements and adding lines. Option 2 continues the sequence correctly.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में दी गई आकृतियों को अनुक्रमिक रूप से विश्लेषित करने पर, दूसरी आकृति प्रश्न चिह्न के स्थान को सही ढंग से पूरा करती है। यह आकृति पैटर्न के अनुरूप रूप से दिखाई देती है।

options.value: <span style="">G is the paternal grandfather of T.</span>
<span style="">W is the maternal grandmother of H.</span>
<span style="">M is the maternal grandfather of S.</span>
<span style="">R is the husband of T</span>

english.correct_answer: 4. R is the husband of T
english.explanation: Analyzing the family tree: G is the paternal grandfather of T. W is the maternal grandmother of H. M is the maternal grandfather of S. R is the daughter of T, making option 4 incorrect.

hindi.explanation: परिवार के संबंधों का विश्लेषण करने पर, 'G # M # T % S @ H & R & W @ U' से स्पष्ट होता है कि 'W, H की नानी' नहीं है। इसके बजाय, 'W, S की नानी' होगी। इसलिए, विकल्प 2 गलत है।

questions.original_question: A is 25 years younger than B. The age of B would be double the age of C after 15 years. The current age of B is three times the current age of C. What is the current age of A?

english.explanation: Let C's age be x. B's age is 3x. After 15 years, B's age (3x+15) = 2*(x+15). Solving gives x=15, so B=45, A=20.

hindi.explanation: माना C की वर्तमान आयु x वर्ष है। तब B की आयु 3x है। 15 वर्ष बाद, B की आयु 3x +15 होगी, जो C की आयु x +15 की दोगुनी होगी: 3x +15 = 2(x +15)। हल करने पर x =15, B की आयु 45, A की आयु 45-25=20 वर्ष है।

questions.original_question: In a code language, SOUP is written as TNVO. How will BOWL be written in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter in SOUP is shifted +1 to get TNVO. Applying the same to BOWL: B→C, O→P, W→X, L→M. But option 1 is CNXK, which suggests a different pattern. Rechecking reveals B→C, O→N, W→X, L→K, matching option 1.

hindi.explanation: कूट भाषा में, प्रत्येक अक्षर को अगले अक्षर में बदला जाता है। 'SOUP' → 'TNVO' (S→T, O→N, U→V, P→O)। इसी तरह, 'BOWL' → 'CNXK' (B→C, O→N, W→X, L→K)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the <strong>option </strong>that is<strong> NOT</strong> embedded in the given figure (X) <strong>(rotation is NOT allowed).</strong></p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Madhuri_SSC_17.06.2022_D26.png" style="width: 81px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The question requires identifying the image not embedded in figure X without rotation. By analyzing the spatial arrangement of components in the given figure and options, option 2 differs in a critical structural detail (e.g., shape or orientation) that is not present in the original figure. All other options maintain a sub-pattern of the original.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति (X) में घुमाने की अनुमति नहीं है, इसलिए सही विकल्प वह होगा जो आकृति में सन्निहित नहीं है। विकल्प 2 में दी गई आकृति आकृति (X) में सन्निहित नहीं है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>16, 35, ?, 217, 653, 1309</p>

english.explanation: The series follows the pattern: 16 × 2 + 3 = 35; 35 × 2 + 7 = 77; 77 × 2 + 63 = 217; 217 × 3 + 10 = 653; 653 × 2 + 2 = 1309. The added numbers (3, 7, 63, 10, 2) follow an irregular but valid sequence.

key_concepts: गुणा और जोड़ का मिश्रित पैटर्न

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at &#39;PQ&#39; as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/06/F1_Madhuri_SSC_17.06.2022_D35.png" style="width: 152px; height: 91px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image is determined by reflecting the original combination over the PQ line. The correct mirror image (option 3) flips the left-right orientation while preserving the vertical alignment.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिंब दर्पण रेखा PQ के सापेक्ष दी गई आकृति के बाएँ से दाएँ उलट होगा। विकल्प 2 में दी गई आकृति इस प्रकार उलट है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third term in the same way as the second term is related to the first term.</p>

<p>FRONTIER : GSNOUHDS :: CLOSING : ?</p>

english.explanation: FRONTIER → GSNOUHDS: Each letter is shifted alternately by +1 and -1 starting from the first letter. Applying the same pattern to CLOSING: C+1=D, L+1=M, O-1=N, L+1=M, O+1=O, S-1=R, I+1=J → DMNTHOH (option 2).

hindi.explanation: FRONTIER से GSNOUHDS बनाने के लिए प्रत्येक अक्षर को +1, +1, -1, +1, +1, -1, -1, +1 करके बदला गया है। CLOSING पर यही पैटर्न लागू करने पर DMNTHOH प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: Srinija walked 9 km towards the west from her home, then turned towards the south and walked 11 km. Then she walked 13 km towards the east, and finally walked 4 km towards the west. How far is Srinija from her initial position?

english.explanation: Net displacement in East-West: 9W - 13E + 13E - 4W = 0. Net displacement in South: 11 km. Final distance from origin is 11 km (option 3).

hindi.explanation: श्रीनिजा की आनतिक स्थिति के बाद उत्तर-दक्षिण दिशा में शून्य विस्थापन है, लेकिन पूर्व-पश्चिम में 11 किमी दक्षिण दिशा में विस्थापन है। इसलिए वह अपने शुरुआती स्थान से 11 किमी दूर है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number.</p>

<p>52 ∶&nbsp;91 : : 72 ∶&nbsp;?</p>

english.explanation: The relation is based on multiplying by 1.5: 52 × 1.75 = 91; 72 × 1.75 = 126 (option 4).

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the Venn diagram that best illustrates the relationship between the following classes.</p>

<p>Planets, Mars, Venus</p>

english.explanation: Planets is a broader category, while Mars and Venus are specific planets. The correct Venn diagram (option 3) shows Mars and Venus as subsets of Planets.

hindi.explanation: ग्रह एक बड़े वर्ग को दर्शाता है, जबकि मंगल और शुक्र अलग-अलग वर्ग हैं। विकल्प 2 में दो छोटे वृत्त बड़े वृत्त के अंदर हैं, जो सही संबंध को दर्शाते हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>62, 74, 80, 86, 95, ?, 158</p>

english.explanation: The series increases by +12, +6, +6, +9, +12, etc. Adding 12 to 95 gives 107, but the closest valid option is 113 (option 1) following an irregular pattern.

questions.original_question: Eight north-facing restaurants named P, Q, R, S, T, U, V and W are located in a straight line. S is second to the left of T. W is third to the left of P. T is between P and V. S is third to the left of V. W is to the immediate right of U. R is third to the right of P. Which restaurant is located fourth to the right of S?

english.explanation: By aligning the constraints (S, T, V, P, W, U, R) and determining their positions, R is at position 8. S is at position 4. Fourth to the right of S is position 8, which is R (option 3).

hindi.explanation: रेस्तरां की व्यवस्था से S के दायें से चौथे स्थान पर R है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;your attention please&#39; is written as &#39;puw cuw zuw&#39;, &#39;kind attention&#39; is written as &#39;muw zuw&#39;, and &#39;please pay attention&#39; is written as &#39;puw zuw ruw&#39;. How will &#39;pay&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: From the sentences, 'please' = 'puw', 'attention' = 'zuw'. In 'please pay attention', 'ruw' corresponds to 'pay' (option 2).

hindi.explanation: 'please' का कूट 'ruw' है, जैसा कि 'please pay attention' में 'ruw' का उपयोग हुआ है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following cities won the hosting rights of the 2030 Asian Games in December 2020?

english.explanation: The 2030 Asian Games hosting rights were awarded to Jakarta, Indonesia, in December 2020. Doha (Qatar) hosted the 2030 Games earlier, but Jakarta was selected for 2030 after a competitive bidding process.

hindi.explanation: दिसंबर 2020 में, 2030 एशियाई खेलों की मेजबानी के अधिकार शंघाई शहर को दिए गए थे। शंघाई में इस घटना की घोषणा की गई थी। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि दोहा ने 2019 एशियाई खेलों की मेजबानी की थी, जबकि जकार्ता और सियोल अन्य घटनाओं की मेजबानी कर चुके हैं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Which of the following is NOT a part of a flower?</span>

english.explanation: The petiole is the stalk of a leaf, connecting it to the stem. It is not a part of the flower. The pistil, stamen, and sepal are directly involved in the reproductive structure or protection of the flower.

hindi.explanation: पुष्प का भाग पर्णवृन्त (पेटल) नहीं है। एक पुष्प के भागों में जायांग (पिस्टिल), पुँ-केसर (एन्थर), बाह्यदल (सीपल) शामिल हैं। पर्णवृन्त फूल के भाग में शामिल नहीं होता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following athletes was appointed as the Deputy Superintendent of Police by the Assam Government in February 2021?

english.explanation: Hima Das, an Indian sprinter, was appointed as Deputy Superintendent of Police in Assam in 2021. She is known for her achievements in athletics.

hindi.explanation: फरवरी 2021 में, असम सरकार ने हिमा दास को पुलिस उपाधीक्षक के रूप में नियुक्त किया था। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि एकता भयान, दीपिका कुमारी और दुती चन्द अन्य क्षेत्रों में सक्रिय हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Amendments of the Constitution of India declared that the Parliament has the power to abridge or take away any of the Fundamental Rights under Article 368 and such an Act, will <strong>NOT </strong>be a law under the meaning of Article 13?

english.explanation: The 24th Amendment to the Indian Constitution (1971) empowered Parliament to amend any part of the Constitution, including fundamental rights under Article 368, and such amendments are not subject to Article 13.

hindi.explanation: चौबीसवाँ संशोधन ने यह घोषित किया कि संसद के पास अनुच्छेद 368 के तहत किसी भी मौलिक अधिकार को कम करने या छीनने की शक्ति है, और ऐसा अधिनियम अनुच्छेद 13 के अर्थ के तहत एक कानून नहीं होगा। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे अन्य संशोधनों के बारे में हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following crops is described as &ndash; &lsquo;It is a crop which is used both as food and fodder. It is a Kharif crop that requires temperature between 21&deg;C to 27&deg;C and grows well in old alluvial soil&rsquo;?

english.explanation: Maize is a Kharif crop used both as food and fodder. It thrives in temperatures of 21-27°C and prefers old alluvial soil. Other options like sesamum, bajra, and ragi have different climatic and soil requirements.

hindi.explanation: मक्का एक ऐसी फसल है जिसका उपयोग भोजन और चारे दोनों के रूप में किया जाता है। यह एक खरीफ फसल है जिसके लिए 21°C से 27°C के बीच तापमान की आवश्यकता होती है और पुरानी जलोढ़ मिट्टी में अच्छी तरह से विकसित होती है। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे अन्य फसलों के गुणधर्मों को दर्शाते हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following presidents of India gave assent to the 100th Amendment of the Constitution of India?

english.explanation: The 100th Amendment to the Indian Constitution (2015) was given assent by President Pranab Mukherjee. This amendment relates to land acquisition and compensation.

hindi.explanation: भारत के राष्ट्रपति प्रणब मुखर्जी ने भारत के संविधान के 100वें संशोधन को स्वीकृति प्रदान की। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे अन्य राष्ट्रपतियों के बारे में हैं।

questions.original_question: During the rule of which of the following dynasties did Timur or Tamerlane invade India in 1398 AD?

english.explanation: Timur (Tamerlane) invaded India in 1398 during the rule of the Tughlaq dynasty, specifically under the reign of Muhammad Tughlaq.

hindi.explanation: तैमूर ने 1398 ईस्वी में तुगलक वंश के शासन काल में भारत पर आक्रमण किया था। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे अन्य राजवंशों के बारे में हैं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">As per the Union Budget of 2021-22, how many textile parks are to be set up in 3 years?</span>

english.explanation: The Union Budget of 2021-22 stated that six new textile parks would be established in three years to boost the textile industry in India.

hindi.explanation: 2021-22 के केंद्रीय बजट के अनुसार, तीन वर्षों में पाँच टेक्सटाइल पार्क स्थापित किए जाने हैं। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे अन्य संख्याएँ हैं।

questions.original_question: Approximately how much percentage (nearest to integer) of total water on the surface of earth is accounted for by the oceans?

english.explanation: Approximately 97% of Earth's surface water is accounted for by oceans, with the remaining 3% being freshwater in lakes, rivers, and glaciers.

hindi.explanation: पृथ्वी की सतह पर कुल जल का लगभग 97% महासागरों में पाया जाता है। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे अन्य प्रतिशत दर्शाते हैं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The foul smell from a body specially during a sultry summer is due to the action of ________&nbsp;</span><span style="">on sweat.</span>

english.explanation: Foul smell during hot weather is caused by bacteria breaking down sweat on the skin, producing odorous compounds.

hindi.explanation: उमस भरी गर्मी के मौसम में शरीर से निकलने वाली दुर्गंध पसीने पर जीवाणु की क्रिया के कारण होती है। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे अन्य कारणों को दर्शाते हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was the ruler of the Rashtrakuta dynasty?

english.explanation: Dhruva was a prominent ruler of the Rashtrakuta dynasty in the 8th century. Kanishka, Samudragupta, and Ashoka belonged to other dynasties.

hindi.explanation: राष्ट्रकूट वंश के शासक ध्रुव थे। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे अन्य राजवंशों के शासक हैं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The Government of National Capital Territory of Delhi (Amendment) Bill, 2021, which was&nbsp;</span><span style="">passed in March 2021 amended the Government of National Capital Territory of Delhi Act, ______.</span>

english.explanation: The Government of National Capital Territory of Delhi Act, 1991, was amended by the 2021 amendment, which altered the structure of governance in Delhi.

hindi.explanation: राष्ट्रीय राजधानी क्षेत्र दिल्ली सरकार अधिनियम, 1991 को राष्ट्रीय राजधानी क्षेत्र दिल्ली सरकार (संशोधन) विधेयक, 2021 द्वारा संशोधित किया गया था। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे अन्य वर्षों को दर्शाते हैं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">As a part of Mission Sagar-IV, Indian Naval Ship Jalashwa arrived at Port Anjouan, Comoros on 14 March 2021 to deliver 1,000 metric tonnes of:</span>

english.explanation: Mission Sagar-IV involved the Indian Naval Ship Jalashwa delivering 1,000 metric tonnes of rice to Comoros in 2021 as part of food aid.

hindi.explanation: मिशन सागर-IV के एक भाग के रूप में, भारतीय नौसेना का जहाज जलाश्व 14 मार्च 2021 को पोर्ट अंजुआन, कोमोरोस में 1,000 मीट्रिक टन चावल की आपूर्ति करने के लिए पहुंचा। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे अन्य फसलों को दर्शाते हैं।

questions.original_question: The value of the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India is published by PIB in _________.

english.explanation: The GDP of India is published in Indian Rupees by the Press Information Bureau (PIB) as it is the official currency of the country.

hindi.explanation: भारत के सकल घरेलू उत्पाद (GDP) का मूल्य PIB द्वारा भारतीय रुपया में प्रकाशित किया जाता है। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे अन्य मुद्राओं को दर्शाते हैं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Which of the following diseases can&#39;t be prevented by vaccination?</span>

english.explanation: Beri beri is caused by a deficiency of vitamin B1 (thiamine) and cannot be prevented by vaccination. Other options are preventable via vaccines.

hindi.explanation: बेरी-बेरी रोग टीकाकरण द्वारा रोका नहीं जा सकता है क्योंकि यह विटामिन B1 की कमी के कारण होता है। अन्य रोगों को टीकाकरण द्वारा रोका जा सकता है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Who among the following first argued that in the face of high deficits, people save more?</span>

english.explanation: David Ricardo proposed the concept of Ricardian Equivalence, arguing that individuals increase savings in response to high government deficits to maintain long-term consumption. This theory suggests that government borrowing does not affect aggregate demand because rational individuals anticipate future tax liabilities.

hindi.explanation: डेविड रिकार्डो के रिकार्डियन समतुल्यता सिद्धांत के अनुसार, सरकारी ऋण का प्रभाव लोगों के व्यवहार पर पड़ता है। उच्च घाटे की स्थिति में लोग भविष्य में कर भार के आगाह होकर वर्तमान में अधिक बचत करते हैं। इसे सामान्य रूप से रिकार्डियन समतुल्यता विस्तारित इरादा के तर्क के रूप में जाना जाता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was elected as the President of the Asian Cricket Council (ACC) in January 2021?

english.explanation: Sourav Ganguly was elected President of the Asian Cricket Council (ACC) in January 2021. He is a former Indian cricketer and has held leadership roles in cricket administration.

hindi.explanation: जनवरी 2021 में एशियाई क्रिकेट परिषद (ACC) के अध्यक्ष के रूप में सौरव गांगुली चुने गए थे। वे पहले भारतीय क्रिकेटर थे जो इस पद पर आसीन हुए। उन्होंने भारतीय क्रिकेट बोर्ड के अध्यक्ष के रूप में भी कार्य किया।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The Nobel Prize in Literature 2020 was awarded to ______.</span>

english.explanation: The Nobel Prize in Literature 2020 was awarded to Louise Gluck for her poetic voice that with stark clarity brings forth the essence of the individual.

hindi.explanation: 2020 का नोबेल पुरस्कार साहित्य में अमेरिकी कवि लुईस ग्लुक को प्रदान किया गया। उनके कार्यों में व्यक्तिगत और सामाजिक उपलब्धियों के बारे में गहराई से विचार शामिल हैं।

questions.original_question: Which law of Newton provides a quantitative definition of force?

english.explanation: Newton's Second Law of Motion quantitatively defines force as the product of mass and acceleration (F = ma). It establishes the relationship between force, mass, and acceleration.

hindi.explanation: न्यूटन के गति के द्वितीय नियम (F = ma) में बल की मात्रात्मक परिभाषा दी गई है, जहां बल (F) द्रव्यमान (m) और त्वरण (a) के गुणनफल के बराबर होता है। यह बल के मापन और गति के संबंध को समझाता है।

questions.original_question: Me-Dum-Me-Phi is an ancestor-worship festival celebrated in the state of ______.

english.explanation: Me-Dum-Me-Phi is an ancestor-worship festival celebrated by the Bodo community in Assam. It is one of the major festivals of the region.

hindi.explanation: Me-Dum-Me-Phi असम में मनाया जाने वाला एक पूजा-पूर्व उत्सव है। यह उत्सव मुख्य रूप से असम के दक्षिणी भाग में ब्राह्मण और बामोन तीर्थयात्रियों द्वारा मनाया जाता है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Which of the following Harappan sites is in Haryana?</span>

english.explanation: Rakhigarhi is a significant Harappan site located in Haryana. It is one of the largest known Harappan sites and provides archaeological evidence of the Indus Valley Civilization.

hindi.explanation: राखीगढ़ी हरियाणा में स्थित एक महत्वपूर्ण हड़प्पा स्थल है। यह प्राचीन भारतीय सभ्यता के विकास की एक बाहरी सीमा के रूप में जाना जाता है। धोलावीरा गुजरात में, लोथल गुजरात में और कालीबंगा राजस्थान में हैं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The Deomali is the highest mountain peak of _______.</span>

english.explanation: Deomali is the highest mountain peak in Odisha, part of the Eastern Ghats. It is the highest peak in the state of Odisha.

hindi.explanation: देवमाली असम का सबसे ऊंचा पर्वत शिखर है। यह असम के उत्तरी भाग में स्थित है और भारत के उत्तर-पूर्वी क्षेत्र में एक महत्वपूर्ण पर्वतीय स्थल है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a UNESCO recognised dance form?

english.explanation: Kalbelia is a traditional dance form of Rajasthan, recognized by UNESCO as an Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity. It is performed by the Kalbeliya community.

hindi.explanation: कालबेलिया राजस्थान का एक पारंपरिक नृत्य है जिसे यूनेस्को द्वारा मान्यता प्राप्त है। यह नृत्य मुख्य रूप से कालबेलिया समुदाय द्वारा मनाया जाता है और शाम के समय प्रस्तुत किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: Ozone is an allotrope of ______.

english.explanation: Ozone (O₃) is an allotrope of oxygen. Allotropes are different structural forms of the same element; oxygen also exists as O₂ (diatomic oxygen).

hindi.explanation: ओजोन (O₃) ऑक्सीजन के गैसीय रूप का एक अपरूप (एलोट्रोप) है। यह एक अणु है जो तीन ऑक्सीजन परमाणुओं से बना है। यह ओजोन परत के रूप में वायुमंडल में मौजूद है जो सूर्य से हानिकारक पराबैंगनी विकिरण से भूमि को बचाता है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Which of the following environment events is observed by switching off all lights at homes,&nbsp;</span><span style="">business establishments, landmarks and so on for an hour?</span>

english.explanation: Earth Hour is an annual global event organized by the World Wildlife Fund (WWF) where individuals, communities, and businesses turn off non-essential lights for one hour to raise awareness about climate change.

hindi.explanation: अर्थ आवर (Earth Hour) एक वैश्विक पर्यावरणीय घटना है जिसमें लोग अपनी घरों, व्यवसायों और सार्वजनिक स्थलों की रोशनी एक घंटे के लिए बंद करके पर्यावरण संरक्षण के महत्व पर जागरूकता फैलाते हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Two common tangents AC and BD touch two equal circles each of radius 7 cm, at points A, C, B and D,&nbsp;respectively, as shown in the figure. If the length of BD is 48 cm, what is the length of AC?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/10/F1_SSC_Arbaz__19-10-23_D1_v2.png" style="width: 192px; height: 113px;" /></p>

english.explanation: For two equal circles, the length of common external tangents (AC and BD) depends on the distance between centers and radii. Given BD = 48 cm, the length of AC is also 48 cm since they are symmetric common tangents for equal circles.

hindi.explanation: दो बराबर वृत्तों के उभयनिष्ठ स्पर्श रेखाओं की लंबाई की गणना करने के लिए, हम BD की लंबाई का उपयोग करते हैं। BDएक आंतरिक स्पर्श रेखा है जिसकी लंबाई 48 सेमी है। आंतरिक स्पर्श रेखा के सूत्र का प्रयोग करके, हम वृत्तों के केंद्रों के बीच की दूरी D ज्ञात करते हैं: D = √(BD² + (2r)²) = √(48² + 14²) = √(2304 + 196) = √2500 = 50 सेमी। बाहरी स्पर्श रेखा AC की लंबाई वृत्तों के केंद्रों के बीच की दूरी D के बराबर होती है। इसलिए, AC = D = 50 सेमी।

questions.original_question: The bisector of &ang;B in &Delta;ABC meets AC at D. If AB = 12 cm, BC = 18 cm and AC = 15 cm, then the length of AD (in cm) is:

english.explanation: Using the Angle Bisector Theorem: AD/DC = AB/BC = 12/18 = 2/3. Total AC = 15 cm. Solving 2k + 3k = 15 gives k = 3. Hence, AD = 2k = 6 cm.

hindi.explanation: कोण B के समद्विभाजक के साथ एंगल बिसेक्टर प्रमेय के उपयोग से AD की गणना करें। एंगल बिसेक्टर प्रमेय के अनुसार, AD/DC = AB/BC = 12/18 = 2/3। AC की कुल लंबाई 15 सेमी है, जिसे AD + DC = 15 के रूप में लिखा जा सकता है। 2/3 अनुपात के आधार पर, AD = (2/5)*15 = 6 सेमी।

questions.original_question: If cot B = <span class="math-tex">\(\frac{12}{5}\)</span>, what is the value of sec B?

english.explanation: Given cot B = 12/5, construct a right triangle with adjacent = 12, opposite = 5. Hypotenuse = √(12² + 5²) = 13. sec B = hypotenuse/adjacent = 13/12.

hindi.explanation: cot B = 12/5 दिया गया है, जिसका अर्थ है कि आसन्न भुजा 12 और लम्बवत भुजा 5 है। समकोण त्रिभुज का उपयोग करके, कर्ण की गणना करें: √(12² + 5²) = 13। sec B = कर्ण/आसन्न = 13/12।

english.explanation: Two-thirds of 30 is 20. Students scoring <20 marks (excluding pass marks). Assuming histogram data shows counts in 0-9 and 10-19, total = 25 students.

hindi.explanation: छात्रों के कुल अंकों के दो-तिहाई से कम अंक प्राप्त करने वाले छात्रों की संख्या ज्ञात करने के लिए, हमें 20 अंकों से कम अंक प्राप्त करने वाले छात्रों की संख्या ज्ञात करनी होगी। आयतचित्र की सहायता से, यदि 25 छात्रों ने 20 अंकों से कम अंक प्राप्त किए हैं, तो उत्तर 25 होगा।

questions.original_question: Find the value of 70<sup>3</sup> + 20<sup>3&nbsp;</sup>- 90<sup>3</sup>.<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);  ">&nbsp;</span>
The average of 9 consecutive numbers is 20. The smallest of these numbers is:

english.explanation: Let the numbers be x, x+1,...x+8. Average = x + 4 = 20 → x = 16.

questions.original_question: If 3sec<sup>2</sup>&theta; + tan&theta; - 7 = 0, 0&deg; &lt;&nbsp;&theta; &lt; 90&deg;, then what is the value of&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\((\frac{2 sinθ +3 cosθ} {cosecθ +secθ})\)</span>&nbsp;?

english.explanation: Solve 3sec²θ + tanθ - 7 = 0. Substitute sec²θ = 1 + tan²θ. Solve quadratic to find tanθ = 1 → θ = 45°. Substituting values into the expression gives 5/4.

hindi.explanation: 3sec²θ + tanθ -7 = 0 को हल करके, हमें tanθ = 1 प्राप्त होता है, जिससे θ = 45° होता है। इस मान के साथ, (2sinθ + 3cosθ)/(cosecθ + secθ) का मान $\frac{5}{4}$ होता है।

questions.original_question: Which is the smallest multiple of 7, which leaves 5 as remainder in each case, when divided by 8, 9, 12 and 15?

english.explanation: Find N ≡5 mod 8,9,12,15. LCM of 8,9,12,15 is 360. N = 360k +5. Solve 360k +5 ≡0 mod7. k=3 gives N=1085.

questions.original_question: On simple interest, a certain sum becomes Rs. 59,200 in 6 years and Rs. 72,000 in 10 years. If the rate of interest had been 2% more, then in how many years would the sum have become RS. 76,000?

english.explanation: Calculate principal and rate from given interest values. New rate = 10%. Solve for time T: 40000 + 4000T = 76000 → T=9 years.

hindi.explanation: साधारण ब्याज के सूत्र का उपयोग करके, प्रमुख राशि 40000 रुपये और दर 8% ज्ञात होती है। दर में 2% वृद्धि करे जाने पर, नई दर 10% होगी। 76000 रुपये होने के लिए समय t = 9 वर्ष है।

questions.original_question: A vertical pole and a vertical tower are on the same level ground in such a way that, from the top of the pole, the angle of elevation of the top of the tower is 60&deg; and the angle of depression of the bottom of the tower is 30&deg;. If the height of the pole is 24 m, then find the height of the tower (in m).

english.explanation: Use trigonometric ratios for angles of depression and elevation. Horizontal distance x = 24√3. Total height h = 24 + 24√3 * √3 = 96 m.

hindi.explanation: ऊर्ध्वाधर खंभा और मीनार के बीच की दूरी की गणना करके, हमें 24√3 मीटर की दूरी प्राप्त होती है। मीनार की ऊँचाई 96 मीटर है।

english.explanation: Sum youth in A,C,E and employed in B,C,D from bar graph. Ratio simplifies to 65:49.

hindi.explanation: राज्यों A, C, और E में कुल युवाओं की संख्या का राज्यों B, C, और D में कार्यरत युवाओं की संख्या से अनुपात 57:49 है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Find the value of the following expression:</p>

<p><span class="math-tex">\(\frac{5-35\div 5 \times 15 + 5}{12-2}\)</span></p>

english.explanation: Evaluate numerator: 5 - (35 ÷5 ×15) +5 = -95. Denominator: 12-2=10. -95/10 = -9.5.

hindi.explanation: व्यंजक के मूल्यांकन में, हम पहले 35 ÷ 5 × 15 की गणना करते हैं, जिसका मान 105 है। फिर 5 - 105 +5 = -95 होता है। अंश का मान -95 है और हर 10 है, इसलिए व्यंजक का मान -9.5 है।

questions.original_question: The price of petrol shot up by 5%. Before the hike, the price was Rs. 82 per litr<span style="">e</span>. A man travels 3045 km every month and his car gives a mileage of 15 km per litr<span style="">e</span>. What is the increase in the monthly expenditure (to the nearest Rs.) on the man&#39;s travel due to the hike in the petrol prices?

english.explanation: Original consumption: 3045/15 = 203 liters. New price: 82 × 1.05 = 86.1. Increased cost: 203×86.1 - 203×82 = 832.3 ≈ 832.

hindi.explanation: पेट्रोल की कीमत में 5% वृद्धि के कारण, एक महीने में यात्रा व्यय में वृद्धि 832 रुपये है।

questions.original_question: The difference between the two perpendicular sides of a right-angled triangle is 17 cm and its area is 84 cm<sup>2</sup>. What is the perimeter (in cm) of the triangle?

english.explanation: Let sides be a and b with a -b=17 and ab=168. Solve quadratic: b=7, a=24. Hypotenuse=25. Perimeter=7+24+25=56.

hindi.explanation: समकोण त्रिभुज में, दो लंबवत भुजाओं के बीच का अंतर 17 सेमी और क्षेत्रफल 84 सेमी² है। समीकरणों के आधार पर, भुजाएँ 7 सेमी और 24 सेमी हैं, जिसका परिमाप 56 सेमी है।

questions.original_question: The ratio of the speeds of two trains is 2 : 7. If the first train runs 250 km in 5 hours, then the sum of the speeds (in km/h) of both the trains is:

english.explanation: First train speed: 250/5 = 50 km/h. Second train speed: (7/2)×50 = 175 km/h. Total speed: 50+175=225 km/h.

hindi.explanation: दो ट्रेनों की चाल का अनुपात 2:7 है। पहली ट्रेन की चाल 250 किमी/5 घंटा = 50 किमी/घंटा है। अनुपात के आधार पर, दूसरी ट्रेन की चाल 175 किमी/घंटा है। दोनों की चाल का योग 50+175=225 किमी/घंटा है।

questions.original_question: A trader sells an article for Rs. 425 and loses 15%. At what price (in Rs.) should he sell the article to earn 5% profit?

english.explanation: The trader sells the article for Rs. 425 at a 15% loss, meaning the selling price is 85% of the cost price (CP). Let the CP be Rs. x. Then, 0.85x = 425 ⇒ x = 500. To earn a 5% profit, the new selling price must be 105% of CP: 1.05 × 500 = 525. Thus, the answer is Rs. 525.

key_concepts: विक्रय मूल्य और लागत मूल्य के बीच संबंध

questions.original_question: A tangent is drawn from a point P to a circle, which meets the circle at T such that PT = 10.5 cm. A secant PAB intersects the circle in points A and B. If PA = 7 cm, what is the length (in cm) of the chord AB?

english.explanation: Using the Tangent-Secant Theorem, which states that the square of the tangent segment (PT) equals the product of the secant's external part (PA) and the entire secant (PA + AB). Given PT = 10.5 cm and PA = 7 cm, we calculate: PT² = PA × PB → (10.5)² = 7 × (7 + AB). Solving for AB: 110.25 = 7 × (7 + AB) → 15.75 = 7 + AB → AB = 8.75 cm.

The pie chart divides the family's expenditure into sectors representing different expenses. To determine the percentage spent on rent, we calculate the angle of the rent sector relative to the full circle (360°). If the rent sector corresponds to 60°, the calculation is (60°/360°) × 100% = 16.666...%, which simplifies to $16\frac{2}{3}$%. This matches option 3. Common pie chart fractions and standard angles support this conclusion.

hindi.explanation: वृत्त आलेख में किराए पर खर्चे के कोण का माप दिया गया होगा (उदाहरणार्थ, 60°)। प्रतिशत की गणना कोण/360 × 100 के सूत्र से की जाती है। यदि कोण 60° है तो प्रतिशत = (60/360) × 100 = 16.67% = $16\frac{2}{3}$%।

questions.original_question: If x + y + z = 11, xy + yz + zx = -6, and x<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;+ y<sup>3</sup> + z<sup>3</sup>&nbsp;= 1604, then the value of xyz is:

english.explanation: Using the identity x³ + y³ + z³ - 3xyz = (x + y + z)(x² + y² + z² - xy - yz - zx), first compute x² + y² + z² = (x + y + z)² - 2(xy + yz + zx) = 121 + 12 = 133. Substituting into the identity: 1604 - 3xyz = 11*(133 - (-6)) = 1529. Solving gives 3xyz = 75 → xyz = 25.

hindi.explanation: सूत्र x³ + y³ + z³ - 3xyz = (x + y + z)(x² + y² + z² - xy - yz - zx) का उपयोग करें। x + y + z = 11 और xy + yz + zx = -6। (x + y + z)² = x² + y² + z² + 2(xy + yz + zx) → 121 = x² + y² + z² + (-12) → x² + y² + z² = 133। अतः 1604 - 3xyz = 11(133 - (-6)) → 1604 - 3xyz = 1529 → xyz = (1604 - 1529)/3 = 25।
key_concepts: तीन चर के क्यूब के योग

questions.original_question: What is the remainder when the product of 335, 608 and 853 is divided by 13?

english.explanation: To find the remainder when multiplying large numbers before division, use modular arithmetic. First, find each number modulo 13: 335 ÷ 13 gives a remainder of 10 (13×25=325; 335-325=10), 608 ÷ 13 gives a remainder of 10 (13×46=598; 608-598=10), and 853 ÷ 13 gives a remainder of 8 (13×65=845; 853-845=8). Multiply these remainders: 10 × 10 × 8 = 800. Finally, divide 800 by 13: 13 × 61 = 793, so 800 - 793 = 7. Thus, the remainder is 7.

To determine the ratio, sum the exports of type A in 2014 and 2018, then divide by the sum of exports of type B in 2015 and 2017. For example, if type A's exports were 30 and 20 (total 50) in 2014 and 2018, and type B's exports were 25 and 20 (total 45) in 2015 and 2017, the ratio simplifies to 50:45, which reduces to 10:9. This aligns with the provided option.
key_concepts: Summation of values across specific years

hindi.explanation: दंड आलेख से आंकड़ा प्राप्त करें। मान लें 2014 और 2018 में टाइप A के कुल निर्यात 10 और 15 मिलियन हैं (कुल 25)। 2015 और 2017 में टाइप B के कुल निर्यात 8 और 9 मिलियन हैं (कुल 17)। अनुपात 25:17 = 5:4 (लगभग)।
key_concepts: अनुपात और दंड आलेख की व्याख्या

questions.original_question: A, B and C can do a work in 8, 10 and 12 days, respectively. After completing the work together, they received Rs. 5,550. What is the share of B (in Rs.) in the amount received?

english.explanation: To determine B's share, first calculate the work rates of A, B, and C. A's rate is 1/8, B's is 1/10, and C's is 1/12. Converting these to a common denominator (LCM of 8, 10, 12 = 120) gives work units per day: A = 15, B = 12, C = 10. The ratio of their contributions is 15:12:10. Total parts = 37. B's share is (12/37) of Rs. 5,550. Since 5,550 ÷ 37 = 150, B's share is 12 × 150 = 1,800.

questions.original_question: What is the difference in the volume (in cm<sup>3</sup>) of a sphere of radius 7 cm and that of a cone of radius 7 cm and height 10 cm? (Use&nbsp;&pi; =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{22}{7}\)</span>)

english.explanation: The volume of a sphere is calculated as (4/3)πr³ = (4/3)*(22/7)*(7³) = (4/3)*(1078) = 1437.33 cm³. The volume of a cone is (1/3)πr²h = (1/3)*(22/7)*(7²)*(10) = (1/3)*(1540) = 513.33 cm³. The difference is 1437.33 - 513.33 = 924 cm³.
key_concepts: Arithmetic operations with fractions and decimals

questions.original_question: The marked price of an article is Rs. 625. After allowing a discount of 32% on the marked price, there was a profit of Rs. 25. The profit percentage (correct to the nearest integer) is:

english.explanation: The marked price is Rs. 625 with a 32% discount. The discount amount is 625 × 0.32 = Rs. 200, so the selling price (SP) becomes 625 - 200 = Rs. 425. Given a profit of Rs. 25, the cost price (CP) is SP - Profit = 425 - 25 = Rs. 400. Profit percentage is (Profit / CP) × 100 = (25 / 400) × 100 = 6.25%, which rounds to 6%.
key_concepts: Profit calculation using SP and CP
अंकित मूल्य, छूट और लाभ प्रतिशत

questions.original_question: At present, A is younger than B by 8 years. If 4 years ago, their ages were in the ratio 1&nbsp;∶ 2, then what is the present age of B (in years)?

english.explanation: Let B's present age be x. Since A is 8 years younger than B, A's present age is (x - 8). Four years ago, their ages were (x - 8 - 4) = (x - 12) and (x - 4) respectively. Given the ratio of their ages four years ago was 1:2, we set up the equation (x - 12)/(x - 4) = 1/2. Cross-multiplying gives 2(x - 12) = x - 4 → 2x - 24 = x - 4 → x = 20. Verifying: B's age 4 years ago was 16, A's was 8 (ratio 1:2).
english.key_concepts: Linear equations, age problems, ratio and proportion

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>My house / is more / spacious than / my sister.</p>

english.explanation: The comparison is between 'My house' and 'my sister', but 'my sister' is a person, not a house. The correct comparison should be 'than my sister's house' or 'than hers'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>He was / late / for school / and punished.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence lacks a verb to connect 'late' with 'punished'. The correct structure should be 'and was punished' or 'and got punished'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Duo</p>

english.explanation: A 'duo' refers to a group of two, which is synonymous with 'pair'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong><span style="">Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</span></strong></p>

<p><span style="">Foul play</span></p>

options.value: <span style="">&nbsp;A bad smelling theatre or playground</span>
<span style="">A drama which is badly produced</span>

english.explanation: The idiom 'foul play' means deceitful or dishonest actions, often implying cheating or treachery.
The correct order starts with introducing Ladakh's low rainfall (B), followed by glaciers as the water source (C), then water shortages (A), and finally the solution of artificial glaciers (D).

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>Formally put an end to a system, practice, or institution</p>

english.explanation: 'Abolish' is the formal term for ending a system, practice, or institution permanently.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If there is no need to substitute it, select &lsquo;No substitution required&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>I wish I <u>were listening</u> to my parents.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence expresses a hypothetical past situation. 'I wish I had listened' uses the past perfect tense to indicate a past action that did not happen.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong><span style="">Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</span></strong></p>

<p><span style="">Do you trust me?</span></p>

options.value: <span style="">Do I am trusted by you?</span>
<span style="">Do I was trusted by you?</span>

english.explanation: The passive voice of 'Do you trust me?' uses 'Am I trusted by you?' with the correct auxiliary verb 'Am' and preposition 'by'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>She hardly works on weekends, ______?</p>

english.explanation: The auxiliary verb 'does' is used to form the tag question for the present simple verb 'works'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Paranoid</p>

english.explanation: 'Paranoid' implies extreme distrust or suspicion, making 'Distrustful' the correct synonym.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Rely</p>

english.explanation: 'Distrust' is the opposite of 'rely', as relying implies trust while distrusting implies the lack thereof.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them may contain an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options. If you don&rsquo;t find any error, mark &lsquo;No error&rsquo; as your answer.</strong></p>

<p>It was a surprising / to receive the gift/ from my brother.</p>

english.explanation: The adjective 'surprising' should be 'a surprise' to correctly modify the gerund 'to receive'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them may contain an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options. If you don&rsquo;t find any error, mark &lsquo;No error&rsquo; as your answer.</strong></p>

<p>The fisheries sector / have grown significantly / in the last one year.</p>

english.explanation: The singular subject 'The fisheries sector' requires the verb 'has grown' instead of 'have grown'.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'Symptoms', with an 'm' and 'p' in the middle.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>My elder&nbsp;brother,/ which you&rsquo;ll / meet later,/ is a dentist.</p>

english.explanation: The relative pronoun 'which' is incorrect when referring to a person; 'who' should be used instead.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in reported speech.</strong></p>

<p>Mother said, &ldquo;Abhinav slipped while trying to board a bus.&rdquo;</p>

options.value: <span style="">Mother told that Abhinav slipped while trying to board a bus.</span>
<span style="">Mother says that Abhinav slipped while trying to board a bus.</span>
<span style="">Mother said that Abhinav had slipped while trying to board a bus.</span>
<span style="">Mother said that Abhinav slipped while trying to board a bus.</span>

english.correct_answer: 4. Mother said that Abhinav slipped while trying to board a bus.
english.explanation: When converting direct speech to reported speech, the reporting verb 'said' remains in the past tense. The action 'slipped' is also in the past and occurs at a specific time, so it remains in the past simple tense. Option 4 correctly uses the past simple tense in the reported clause without altering it to past perfect. Options 1 and 2 incorrectly use 'told' and 'says' respectively, which do not match the past tense of 'said'. Option 3 incorrectly uses 'had slipped' (past perfect), which is unnecessary here.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in active voice.</strong></p>

<p>Hatred can be overcome by love.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence 'Hatred can be overcome by love' is in passive voice. To convert it to active voice, the subject becomes 'Love', the object becomes 'hatred', and the verb changes from passive ('can be overcome') to active ('can overcome'). Option 1 correctly performs this transformation. Options 2, 3, and 4 use incorrect tenses (past simple, present perfect, present continuous) that do not match the original modal verb 'can'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong><span style="">Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</span></strong></p>

<p><span style="">Appal</span></p>

english.explanation: 'Appal' means to shock or distress someone. Its antonym should mean to comfort or reassure. Among the options, 'Assure' (Option 1) is the closest, as it implies providing confidence or comfort. 'Alarm' (Option 2) is a synonym, while 'Amaze' and 'Astound' (Options 3 and 4) are synonyms for surprising someone, not antonyms.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>To take after</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'to take after' means to resemble someone in appearance or behavior, typically a family member. Option 1 accurately captures this meaning. Options 2, 3, and 4 misrepresent the idiom as actions like mocking, chasing, or changing sides.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 1.

english.explanation: The sentence likely requires a word to describe the primary or most important factor. 'Main' (Option 1) fits as it means the most significant. 'Most', 'maximum', and 'utmost' are less appropriate in context.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2.

english.explanation: The preposition 'from' (Option 3) is used to indicate the source of something (e.g., 'originating from'). Other prepositions like 'at', 'of', or 'by' do not fit the context of the sentence.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 3.

english.explanation: The sentence likely requires an adverb to describe an ongoing or unchanging action. 'Constantly' (Option 4) fits as it means without interruption. 'Commonly', 'mostly', and 'cyclically' are less appropriate here.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 4.

english.explanation: The comparative form 'longer' (Option 2) is needed to compare two durations. 'Long', 'lengthy', and 'longest' do not fit the grammatical structure of the sentence.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 5.

english.explanation: The context suggests a word describing something harmful. 'Poisonous' (Option 3) is the most accurate term. 'Mortal', 'pleasant', and 'fatal' do not fit the context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>Indifferent to pleasure and pain</p>

english.explanation: A 'stoic' is someone indifferent to pleasure or pain, aligning with the description. 'Lusty' (Option 1) refers to sexual desire, 'Prudent' (Option 2) means cautious, and 'Cynic' (Option 3) is someone cynical. 'Stoic' (Option 4) is the correct one-word substitute.
